comment: [Physical] Long-ranged attack.\nA fiendish monkey that attacks\nfrom afar by lobbing boulders.
[Healing] Area healing.\nA bird-like monster that uses\nthe magic in its belly to heal allies.
[Magic] Area attack.\nWatcher of the underworld that spews forth searing flames\nas it opens the doors of hell.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA wolf-like monster that shreds\nits enemies with its sharp claws.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A deer-like monster that uses its
large horns for both attack and
defense.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA reindeer-like monster that lives in the mountains.\nBeneath its thick furs is a tough body.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nThe weak attacks of this rat-like\nmonster land at furious speed.

[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.
This decayed tree monster hurls
bolts of magic into the midst
of parties.

[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.
A cursed stone statue that
throws balls of fire and
inflicts additional burn damage.
[Physical] Long-ranged attack.\nA mountain spirit with teeth\nstrong enough to eat rocks.
[Physical] Long-ranged attack.\nA snowy mountain spirit that uses chunks of ice\nas both food and weapon.
[Physical] Front / Short-ranged\nA tree monster that wields its\nsupple limbs like whips.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A tree-like monster that uses its
twisted branches to drag
adventurers deeper into the
forest.
[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.\nAn accumulation of grudges surrounded by flames of hell\nthat attacks the living.

[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.
A wolven creature that wields
bones bound together like a
boomerang.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A monster of stone whose
sturdy body grants it solid
offense and defense.
[Physical] [Magic Defense] Short-ranged attack.\nA magic-resistant golem born from magic boulders.

[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.
A flower made from stone that
attacks with bullet-like
pebbles.

[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.
The flower on its tail gives off a
terrible stench, though the smell
eventually becomes addictive.
[Magic] [Support] Area attack.\nA cloud-like monster that can manipulate the weather at will\nand shoot bolts of lightning.
[Healing] Area healing.\nA jellyfish-like monster that can fight on land\nby storing water in its diving suit.

[Magic] [Summon] Short-ranged
attack.
A roaming forest spirit that can
use earth magic to summon
magic mushrooms.
[Physical] [Magic Defense] Short-ranged attack.\nA living statue that repels all magic attacks with its shield.
[Physical] [Physical Defense] Short-ranged attack.\nA living statue that repels all physical attacks with its sword.

[Physical] Long-ranged attack.
A salamander-like monster that lives in the sludge of swamps
and shoots strong poison
from its mouth.

[Physical] [Physical Defense]
Short-ranged attack.
A massive turtle-like monster
that can repel any physical
attack with its shell.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA mushroom spirit that sprouts endlessly\nin response to a Dryad's summoning.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA walking mushroom that is surprisingly delicious\nwhen cooked.

[Magic] Short-ranged attack.
A rabbit-like monster that can
flap its large ears to propel
itself forward.

[Magic] Long-ranged attack.
A high-ranked demon that
summons fire from hell with
its magic.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A large, ape-like monster with
arm muscles strong enough to
swing among stalactites.

[Magic] Short-ranged attack.
A cave-dwelling, bat-like
monster that attacks upon
hearing the footsteps of its prey.

[Healing] Area healing.
A snail-like monster rumored to
secrete slime that is good for
the skin.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A hermit crab warrior that uses
the helmet of a defeated knight
as its shell.
[Physical] Area attack.\nA wandering crow that has\ndefeated strong monsters around Astrum.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A poisonous, lizard-like monster
that leaves fatal bite wounds
with its sharp teeth.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A rock lizard-like monster
whose head is as tough as
an armor.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA fashionista among lizards with vibrant leaves on its collar.

[Magic] Short-ranged attack.
Physical attacks don't land
easily on the slick form of this
slime.

[Magic] Short-ranged attack.
A violent Gellatina that was
caught in a forest fire and
set alight.

[Magic] Short-ranged attack.
The ferocious flames this
fledgling wyrm breathes bely
its small size.
[Magic] Short-ranged attack.\nA trainee demon that scratches\nwith its abnormally large claws.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A trainee goblin soldier who
protects its allies with a large
shield almost as big as itself.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA protector of the jungle that wards off invaders and\nintimidates its enemies with a large, face-like shield.
[Healing] Single target healing.\nA mysterious firefly, the nectar accumulated in its abdomen is a source of nutrition for monsters.

[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.
A mole-like monster that digs
underground to attack from
under its enemies' feet.

[Physical] Area attack.
A nasty, squirrel-like monster
that throws the shells of nuts
after eating them.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A savage, axe-wielding
Beastman who wears the
armor of adventurers it defeats.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A high-ranked orc with a tough
body honed from rigorous
training.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
A living cannon that, after many
years of use, is now inhabited
by an evil spirit.
[Physical] Close-range.\nA baby gryphon. Its wings are still too small for it to fly.

[Healing] Area healing.
A famous singer among bird
monsters, its song of healing
is heard far and wide.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
Uses the corrosive liquid inside
its wide-open mouth to eat
captured prey.
[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.\nA baby devil that attacks wildly\nwith newly learned magic.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA crab-like monster with large claws and a tough shell.\nIt can go up against opponents of any size.
[Magic] Area attack.\nA manta ray-like monster that skillfully hunts using supersonic waves\nemitted from the stone on its head.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA large boar enveloped by an armor of tough leaves\that are painful to the touch. However, its armor is still just leaves. It is weak against magic.
[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.\nTaking the spear of a drowned knight,\nthis seahorse-like warrior protects its territory.
[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.\nA bird-like monster that attacks with\nice-clad tail feathers.

[Physical] The Starbeast of Taurus, lurking deep within its labyrinthine lair. With its massive battleaxe, it slays all adventurers who dare approach.

- Deals large physical damage to all enemies and inflicts Burn.
- Deals large physical damage to an enemy, knocks them back, and inflicts Stun.
- Deals moderate magical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Paralyze.

[Magic] The Starbeast of Aries, now imbued with still greater power. Confines adventurers in its prison of desolate sleep and feasts upon their souls.

- Deals large magical damage to all enemies, and additional small magical damage to enemies with Bind.
- Deals moderate magical damage to enemies in range.
- Inflicts Bind on one enemy.

[Physical] A reptilian warrior
that wields twin blades and
blinds foes with smoke bombs.

-Deals medium physical damage
to one character at random.

-Blinds and deals minor physical
damage to foes in a small area
centered around a random target.
[Physical] A demonic flower that performs an area attack with its vines to drain the energy from adventurers who approach it.\n\n- Lowers physical defense of 3 allies in front and inflicts poison.

[Physical] A Creeper transformed by a strange power. Ensnares its foes in tendrils covered in countless thorns.

- Deals moderate physical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Restrain.
- Lowers the physical defense of enemies in range and inflicts Poison.

[Physical] An orc among orcs. Leads the pack as its chieftain and unleashes a flurry of earth-shattering attacks to deal large damage to the enemy.

- Deals moderate physical damage to 3 characters in a radius around a random target and boosts own physical defense.

- Boosts physical attack of all allies.

An Orc Leader transformed by a strange power. The massive shield it wields provides both offensive and defensive capabilities.

- Deals large physical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Stun.
- Sharply lowers physical defense of enemies in range.

[Physical] A legendary Wild Horn whose rampages are unstoppable. Its cries are said to reach the heavens.

- Deals moderate physical damage to all enemies and knocks them back slightly.

- Deals moderate physical damage to 3 characters in front and lowers their physical attack and defense.

[Physical] An Elder Horn transformed by a strange power. It stores magical energy in its horns, allowing it to deliver powerful blows.

- Deals large magical damage to enemies in range, knocks them back, and inflicts Stun.
- Deals small magical damage to enemies in range, and lowers their magical defense and attack speed by a small amount.
[Physical] It shatters the ground with a powerful headbutt attack, causing great damage to the whole party. Its body and shell have evolved to make this turtle tyrant as enormous as a rocky mountain.

[Physical] A fierce deepsea dragon capable of freezing the enemy vanguard in an instant, then shattering their bodies with its fangs.

- Deals moderate physical damage to 3 characters in front.

- Deals moderate physical damage to 2 characters in front and inflicts Freeze.

[Physical] The tyrannical ruler of the forest, which uses surprising dexterity and piercing fangs to weaken its foes before tearing them apart with its gigantic claws.

- Deals large physical damage to 4 characters in front.

- Deals small physical damage to a character in front and lowers their physical attack. Boosts own physical attack.

A Savage Bear transformed by a strange power. Swings down its brawny arms in a blind rage to tear the very ground beneath its foes.

- Deals large physical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Stun.
- Deals small physical damage to an enemy directly in front and lowers their physical attack by a moderate amount.

[Physical] A gigantic golem formed from the magically-reconstituted cores of countless fallen golems. Endlessly summons golem minions while eroding the foe's physical and mental strength with needles of rock.

- Deals moderate physical damage to 4 characters in front and reduces their TP.

- Summons a golem.

[Physical] A wolf from hell and an incarnation of cruelty that has brought countless adventurers' journeys to an untimely end. Paralyzes its prey with an unearthly howl before tearing their flesh with its claws.

- Deals large physical damage to 2 random characters.

- Deals small magic damage to 3 characters in front and inflicts Paralyze.

[Physical] A large monster bird that brings raging storms wherever it goes.
Straight out of a monster picture book, there is no limit to the destruction it causes.
- Deals large damage to the entire party
based on each character's maximum HP.
- Deals moderate physical damage to characters in the vanguard and stuns them.

[Physical] A large monster bird that brings raging storms wherever it goes.
Straight out of a monster picture book, there is no limit to the destruction it causes.
- Deals large damage on the entire party
based on each character's maximum HP.
- Deals moderate physical damage to characters in the vanguard
and stuns them.
- Deals moderate damage to characters in the vanguard based on each of their maximum HP
and also reduces their physical defense.
- When Ziz's own HP falls below 50%,
its attacks become more vicious.

[Physical] A hunter of the ocean, constantly scanning for favorable waves and unwitting prey with its piercing gaze. Summons boundless waters from its own magical energy to dull its foes' blades and drain their battle spirit.

- Deals moderate physical damage to 4 characters in front and lowers their physical attack.

- Deals small magic damage to 2 characters in front and reduces their TP.

A Mini-Gryphon that has braved its harsh environment to attain a new form. Lifts its prey from the ground with whirlwinds to hunt them in the air.\n\n- Deals moderate magical damage to enemies in range.
A form of dragon that rides the wind on great leathery wings. Breathes great balls of fire to ward off intruders.\n\n- Deals moderate physical damage to enemies in range.

[Magic] An ancient weapon awakened by the magical energies of Luna. Obstructs intruders with a merciless magical assault.

- Deals massive magical damage to all enemies and reduces their magical defense by a large amount.
- Deals large physical damage to enemies in range.
- Deals large magical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Paralyze.

[Physical] The most glamorous diva of the snowy lands. Descends amidst a raging blizzard with a flock of minions in tow to assault any who dare invade her territory.

- Deals moderate magic damage to 4 characters in front and lowers their physical attack.

- Deals small magic damage to 2 random characters and inflicts Freeze.
